Paragraph: In the out - of - plane of PQCDTB , as shown Figure 1a , a sharp diffraction peak was observed at 4.0 , 8.1 , 12.2 ° , which indicates the formation of ordered lamellar structure as an out - of - plane peak ( h00 ) by the alkyl side chain of quinacridone and conventional edge-on πstacking.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| PQCDTB |
| quinacridone |
| alkyl side chain |
| edge-on πstacking |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| quinacridone |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "out-of-plane" (this is a term used to describe the crystal structure of the material, but it is not a material name)
* "edge-on π-stacking" (this is a term used to describe the stacking arrangement of molecules in the material, but it is not a material name)
